item.title: Escaping from the Asian Civilisations Museum: A Great Adventure
item.description: Singapore’s Asian Civilisations Museum is hosting “Night at the Museum: The Great Escape from Asian Civilisations Museum,” featuring two evenings of movies and interactive games. This event, possibly the first of its kind globally, is designed as a museum-wide escape room. Participants will solve puzzles, uncover museum secrets, and decipher the meanings behind ancient artifacts to “escape.” Winners have a chance to win movie tickets to Night at the Museum: Secret of the Tomb.
